Ghost Walk: Spectral form gives 10' fly, Disadv foe attacks, move through objects for 10 min 1/long rest (destroy Soul Trinket for additional)

Psionic Power: Use 12d12 Psionic Energy dice/long rest; regain 1 Psionic Energy die as bonus action after short rest

Shelter Of The Faithful: May receive aid from temples of Egyptian-Set and fellow believers
Tokens Of The Departed: Soul released from Soul Trinket answers 1 question

Armor Proficiency: Light Weapon Proficiency: Hand Crossbow; Longsword; Rapier; Shortsword; Simple

Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +40
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +1

Strength Attack Adjustment: +3
Strength Damage Adjustment: +3
Cunning Action: May use a bonus action to Dash, Disengage, or Hide 1/rd
Death's Friend: Sneak Attack target affected by Wails From The Grave use
Durable: Regains a minimum of 4 HP from a Hit Die roll
Elusive: Attacks on self never have Adv
Homing Strikes: Add 1d12 to failed Psychic Blade attack, spend 1 Psionic Energy die if the sum is enough to hit
Psychic Blades: Two R60' magic psychic blade attacks inflict 1d6+3 HP psychic and 1d4+3 HP psychic
Psychic Teleportation: Spend 1 Psionic Energy die to teleport 1d12 x 10'
Rend Mind: Sneak Attack with Psychic Blade stuns for 1 min (DC 15 Wis ends) 1/long rest (spend 3 Psionic Energy dice for additional)
Sharpshooter: Suffers no Disadv on attacks at long range/Range attacks ignore 3/4 cover/May suffer -5 attack w/a ranged weapon to gain +10 damage
Sneak Attack: +10d6 damage on attacks w/Adv or shared threat
Steady Aim: Forego move for Adv on attack
Stroke Of Luck: May change a miss into a hit or take an automatic 20 on an ability check 1/short rest
Tokens Of The Departed: Destroying Soul Trinket gives extra Wails From The Grave use
Uncanny Dodge: May use Reaction to reduce damage taken from an attack by half
Wails From The Grave: R30' Sneak Attack inflicts 5d6 HP necrotic on second creature 6/long rest
Save Proficiency: Dexterity; Intelligence; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 2; Constitution: 2; Dexterity: 7; Intelligence: 10; Strength: 3; Wisdom: 6
Save Notes:
Slippery Mind: Save Proficiency (Wisdom)
Evasion: Successful Dexterity save yields no damage instead of half; failure yields half damage
Tokens Of The Departed: Adv on Con and saves vs. death

Magic Initiate (Cleric): Knows 2 C0 spells/May cast chosen C1 spell 1/long rest
Psychic Veil: Self becomes invisible for 1 hr or until inflicts damage or forces saving throw 1/long rest (spend 1 Psionic Energy die for additional)
